name: Walking Statue of Waterdeep
damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, stunned

traits.Crumbling Colossus: When the statue drops to 0 hit points, it crumbles and is destroyed. Any creature on the ground within 30 feet of the crumbling statue must make a DC 22+1d12 + 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
traits.Immutable Form: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.
traits.Magic Resistance: The statue has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Siege Monster: The statue deals double damage to objects and structures.
